name: parcel-plugin-pwa-manifest
description: A Parcel plugin that generates a Web App Manifest, creates all necessary icons, and more!
author: Arjun Barrett <arjunbarrett@gmail.com>

scripts.test-built: rm -rf test-build/ && cp -r lib/ test-build/ && jest
scripts.test: parcel build src/index.ts -t node --out-dir test-build/ --no-source-maps --cache-dir .test-cache && jest
scripts.build: tsc && yarn lint && parcel build src/index.ts -t node --out-dir lib/ --detailed-report --no-source-maps --experimental-scope-hoisting && yarn test-built
